subject: Is this the same company or a fake company
description_text:
I ordered pedals from an amazon page who claims to be the simsonn company,
the email in the user manual said to email support@simsonn.com and I wanted
to make sure these are through the same entity and that the amazon page
wasn't a fake page to look like you.

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DJ29V2Z7?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_fed_asin_title

This is the amazon page I purchased from.

Thank you for your time,
Matthew

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt,  The link you provided is indeed an authorized SIMSONN store. Please rest assured — it is an official partner shop, and all products and after-sales services are fully guaranteed.
